email_body: yea they were doing spoofs on the rules of business. i'll tell you about it later. kind of funny. however, it took 2 hours for 30 seconds of film From: Margaret Allen@ENRON on 11/02/2000 08:50 AM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Re: NYC rocks Without me! I can't believe you... Just kidding. What was it for -- the management conference?
